ModMetaData.name: Additional Robots
ModMetaData.author: FireFoX
ModMetaData.description:
Mod Version: 1.1.0
*** Example Load Order *** - Core - Misc. Robots - Misc. Robots++ - RF - Fishing (optional) - RimBees (optional) - Rimatomics (optional) - Additional Robots
Adds a new kitchen-like bot type that can do fishing with RF's fishing mod. Adds a new hauler-like robot that can do beekeeping with the RimBees mod.
Also allows omnibots to do the above actions.
Adds a new hauler-like robot that can move the radioactive rods of Rimatomics without permanent injury. Omnibots are not sturdy enough for this particular job.
A separate research job is also added for the beekeper and for the atom bots.
